items.title: 常闇トワ＆獅白ぼたんのサイン入り色紙が当たる！『灰仭巫覡』新PV＆オリジナルソング公開記念キャンペーン開催
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
大暮維人先生が描く人気漫画『灰仭巫覡（カイジンフゲキ）』のオリジナルソングと新PVの公開を記念し、2025年9月5日より豪華プレゼントキャンペーンがスタートしました。

新PV公開！常闇トワ＆獅白ぼたんが歌うオリジナルソング

2025年9月3日、講談社の「マガジンチャンネル」にて『灰仭巫覡』の新たなプロモーションビデオが公開されました。

このPVのために書き下ろされたオリジナルソング『君と明かした夜』は、ホロライブ所属の人気VTuberである常闇トワさんと獅白ぼたんさんが歌唱を担当。

今回の発表を記念して、抽選で1名様にが当たるキャンペーンが開催されます。

  1. 『灰仭巫覡』公式X（旧Twitter）アカウント（@KAIJINFUGEKI_WM）をフォロー
  2. ※「#灰仭巫覡PV公開」「#カイジンフゲキ」のハッシュタグが付いたポストが目印です。

2025年9月5日（金）0:00 〜 2025年9月14日（日）23:59まで

利用規約に同意し、日本国内にお住まいで郵便物・宅配物の受け取りが可能な方。

注意事項：色紙には当選者の宛名が記載されます。当選者にはXのダイレクトメッセージにて連絡があります。

『灰仭巫覡』コミックス第1巻から第5巻まで好評発売中です。

items.title: 【速報】戌神ころね、ホンダのeスポーツ大会アンバサダーに2年連続で就任！→本人も「よろしくお願いします」と意気込み「世界の戌神」「今年もきた！」
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
人気VTuberグループ「ホロライブ」所属の戌神ころねさんが、本田技研工業（Honda）が主催するeモータースポーツのグローバル大会「Honda Racing eMS 2025」の公式アンバサダーに、昨年に引き続き就任したことが発表されました。

このニュースに、ファンからは「2年連続はすごすぎる！」「今年も応援します！」といった声が相次いでいます。

「Honda Racing eMS」は、世界3地区（アジア・オセアニア、米州、欧州・中東・アフリカ）のトップドライバーたちが地域最速の座をかけて競い合う、本格的なeモータースポーツのグローバル大会です。

戌神さんは「Honda Racing eMS 2024」でもアンバサダーを務めており、今回で2年連続という大役を担うことになります。

ゲーム実況で人気を誇る戌神ころねと、世界のHondaとのコラボが再び実現しました。

2025年8月26日、Honda Racing eMSの公式X（旧Twitter）アカウントが「━ Honda Racing eMS 2025 開催 ━ 昨年に続き『戌神ころね』が公式アンバサダーに！」とポストし、戌神さんのアンバサダー就任を正式に発表。

あわせて、されるという大会スケジュールも公開しました。

この公式発表に対し、戌神さん本人も自身のXアカウントで「今年もアンバサダーを務めさせていただきます！よろしくお願いします」と引用ポストし、就任への意気込みを表明しました。

この就任のニュースに、ファンからは「世界のHondaに認められた女、戌神ころね」「ころさんの影響力すごい！」「これを機にレースゲームに挑戦してみようかな」など、驚きと喜びのコメントがありました。

items.title: ときのそら、史上最大規模のワンマンライブを東京国際フォーラムで開催決定！「夢が叶った！」「絶対行く！」とファン歓喜
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
ホロライブプロダクション所属のVTuber「ときのそら」さんが、自身の活動史上最大規模となるワンマンライブの開催を発表。　

ホロライブ0期生としてVTuberシーンの黎明期から業界を牽引してきた「ときのそら」さんが、にて、ワンマンライブ「New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』」を開催することを発表しました。

ときのそらさんにとって史上最大規模となる本公演でSNSではファンから「国際フォーラムはすごすぎる！」「そらちゃんの夢がまた一つ叶う瞬間に立ち会えるなんて…」といった歓喜の声が相次ぎました。

“そらとも”と共に描く「Dreams in Motion」

今回のライブは、ときのそらさんが毎年開催している恒例のニューイヤーパーティ、通称「そらぱ」の特別版。

公演タイトルの「Dreams in Motion（ドリームズ・イン・モーション）」には、夢に向かって歩み続けるときのそらさん自身と、その姿を見守り、応援し続けるファン＝“そらとも”の想いが込められているとのこと。

本公演は、昼公演＜Day＞と夜公演＜Night＞の2部構成で開催。それぞれ異なる演出が期待されています。

チケットは、最前エリアが確約され、Tシャツや無線制御ペンライト、限定ボイスなどの豪華特典が付いたSS席（¥18,800）から、学生にも優しい学割チケット（¥5,150）まで、幅広い券種が用意されています。

また、遠方のファンに向けた配信チケットも販売され、こちらも限定グッズ付きのプランが用意されるなど、すべての“そらとも”が楽しめる配慮がなされています。

items.title: 星街すいせい、新曲「月に向かって撃て」が新作アニメ『真夜中ハートチューン』OPテーマに決定！
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
ホロライブ所属のVTuber、星街すいせいの新曲「月に向かって撃て」が、2026年1月より放送開始となるTVアニメ『真夜中ハートチューン』のオープニングテーマ（OP）に決定したことが発表されました。

本日、TVアニメ『真夜中ハートチューン』の公式X（旧Twitter）アカウント（@anime_mayochu）にてPV第2弾が公開され、あわせて主題歌情報が解禁となりました。星街すいせいが歌う「月に向かって撃て」が、本作のオープニングを飾ります。

なお、エンディングテーマ（ED）はSoalaさんの「声の軌跡」に決定しています。

TVアニメ『真夜中ハートチューン』は、2026年1月6日(火)23時より、カンテレ・フジテレビ系全国ネット“火アニバル!!”枠、BS朝日ほかにて放送開始予定です。

items.title: ホロライブ、年末恒例のカウントダウンライブ開催決定！ 発表に「これがないと年越せない！」
items.author: ホロミ
items.content:
VTuber事務所「ホロライブプロダクション」は9月5日、公式X（旧Twitter）にて、年末恒例の大型ライブ『hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2025▷2026』を、2025年12月31日（水）に開催することを発表した。

この待望のニュースに、ファンからは「やっぱりこれがないと年は越せない！」「全編無料はありがたすぎる」といった喜びの声が殺到している。

年末の風物詩！所属タレントがほぼ総出演する豪華ライブ

ホロライブプロダクションが毎年大晦日に開催するカウントダウンライブは、所属タレントが一堂に会する、まさしく”お祭り”と呼ぶにふさわしい一大イベントだ。

ホロライブ、ホロスターズの所属タレントのほぼ全員が3Dで出演し、オリジナル曲やこの日限りの特別ユニットによるパフォーマンスを全編無料で配信。

年々スケールアップする圧巻のクオリティと、幸福感に満ちた演出で世界中のファンを魅了してきた。

昨年開催された『hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2024▷2025』では、60名を超えるタレントが出演。

バラエティ企画満載の『ゆくホロくるホロ』からライブ本編へと繋がる構成で、ファンを飽きさせない工夫が凝らされていた。

今年も同様の形式が期待されており、どのタレントがどんな楽曲を披露するのか、期待が高まっている。

この発表に、ファンからは「うおおおお！今年も来た！生きる理由をありがとう！」「毎年クオリティが上がり続けてるから今年も楽しみすぎる」「全編無料…？ホロライブの福利厚生、手厚すぎ！」「大晦日の予定、即決しました」といった歓喜のコメントが殺到。また、「推しと推しのユニットが見たい！」「今年はどんな絡みがあるかな？」など、具体的なパフォーマンス内容を予想し、胸を膨らませる声も多く見られた。

items.title: Mining Base Reveals hololive English Collaboration Gaming PC Collection
items.author: Horii
items.content:
December 29, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) has announced a new merchandise collaboration with Mining Base Co., Ltd in partnership with hololive production, featuring talents from hololive English -Myth- and hololive English -Promise-.

This collaboration introduces a special series of hololive English collaboration PC products, combining Mining Base’s advanced PC hardware expertise with designs inspired by the worlds and personalities of hololive English talents. Each item is crafted to deliver both high performance and strong visual presence, staying true to Astromeda’s concept of “gaming PCs designed to be displayed.”

The lineup includes a wide range of items, from fully built PCs to customizable accessories, allowing fans to enjoy the collaboration at multiple levels.

For more information, please visit Mining Base’s official website and social media platforms.

7 models × 2 versions: Myth / Promise

Mini Rubber Type (Each available in Myth / Promise designs)

・ Interchangeable Panel Sets 2 types: Myth / Promise

2 types: Myth / Promise

From December 29, 2025 to December 29, 2026

Available exclusively in Japan

Astromeda is a gaming PC brand launched in 2018, created to redefine the image of gaming PCs as part of interior design rather than devices hidden under desks. From its early days, Astromeda gained attention for its industry leading illuminated designs, transforming the conventional perception of gaming PCs as plain and invisible.

In recent years, Astromeda has actively developed collaboration models with various IPs, popular anime, and game titles, leveraging its unique design philosophy and craftsmanship. These special edition PCs, carefully designed to reflect each collaboration’s world and aesthetic, have received high praise from fans.

With the concept of “a gaming PC you want to place on your desk,” Astromeda continues to focus not only on performance, but also on the value of visual appeal, aiming to make everyday PC life more enjoyable and more personal.

items.title: Guide: Getting the Most Out of Events in Holoearth!
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Hi there! This is Anna Rocca from the Holoearth Tourism Agency.

For today’s guide, I will introduce ways to better utilize Holoearth to improve your experience for NePoLaBo Live—enjoy using event items and gestures with everyone to really liven up the show!

Please continue reading to be fully prepared for the day of the event!

I will cover the following four categories this time:

1. Interacting with other users with gestures.2. Using penlights with gestures.3. Adjusting options settings for a better experience.4. Using Photo Mode and participating in the photo contest.5. Adjusting “Visuals” for a better experience.

One way to communicate with other users in Holoearth is with gestures. Press and hold the B key to open the gesture setup screen.

Click “Edit gestures” to display a list of gestures you have purchased, then drag and move the ones you want to set.

You can set up a total of 9 sets of gestures, each using the F1-F8 keys, so try switching between them depending on the situation.

You can wave penlights by combining them with gestures. You can set penlight items you have purchased in the hotbar at the bottom of the screen to make them faster to use.

After doing this, click the shortcut button or press the corresponding keyboard number to use it.

By combining it with gestures such as those in the “Hype Up” series, you will be able to wave the penlights.

Adjusting audio settings is also useful for making the most out of a concert experience. Press the Esc key to open the global options menu, then check the Sound section.

By adjusting the Media volume, you can change the volume of the performance. Set it to a level that feels comfortable for you and enjoy the show!

For NePoLaBo Live, photography is allowed. You will want to capture a special memory of your own, right?

Press P to switch to Photo Mode. Since you can shoot from many different angles, it offers more flexibility than a standard screenshot.

Also, a photo contest is planned for the NePoLaBo Live! Try posting your best shots on X with the hashtag #NePoLaBoHoloearthLive.

Your photo might be featured on the official website, or you could even receive a special gift…

For more details, check the URL below!

Here, you can toggle features like “NaviRobo Display,” “Other Users’ Actions” (such as poppers or fireworks), and adjust the number of player models rendered in the area. Enjoy the performance in a way suited just for you!

items.title: Holoearth First-Timers & How to Participate in NePoLaBo Live
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Hi there! This is Anna Rocca from the Holoearth Tourism Agency.

With the upcoming virtual concert “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live” on Sunday, December 21, 2025, I put together a brief guide for those who are new to Holoearth or who may be unfamiliar with how to use the service.

Please continue reading to be fully prepared for the day of the event!

To participate in the NePoLaBo Live concert in Holoearth, there are four things you will need to do, as listed below!

1. Download for PC (Windows). 2. Register an account with Google or Apple ID.

3. Purchase the “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder” item in the shop in Holoearth.

4. Enter the “NePoLaBo re:VISION Holoearth Live” area in Holoearth after 18:00 (JST) on Dec 21 (Sun).

All that is needed to use Holoearth is a PC (Windows). No VR equipment is required. See the download page for PC spec requirements.

Holoearth is only available for Windows.

Feel free to use the following as a detailed reference guide for how to use Holoearth and participate!

1: Installing Holoearth & Account Creation

The Holoearth application must first be downloaded and installed before using the service.

Download the Holoearth launcher from the download page

Download the Holoearth Launcher from the download page and install it.

After installing the launcher, launch it via the “Holoearth Launcher” icon that was created.

Click “Install” to begin the installation of the main Holoearth application. After installation, this button will become the “Start” button.

When an update is available, the same button will change to “Update.”

Launcher Installation Troubleshooting

Click the gear icon in the upper right to open the launcher options menu, then choose “Support” from the menu and then “Open Log Folder” for the relevant error code that can be used when submitting a help inquiry.

Account Creation & Logging In

Once installed, the launcher will display a “Start” button, which will open your web browser.

If you do not yet have a Holoearth account, you will be prompted to create one, using either a Google account or Apple ID.

Then, agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy and click Register to finish and log in.

Afterward, when Holoearth is installed and launched correctly the title menu will show the animated PV, “Now, discover your other world,” and prompt you to “CLICK TO START.”

On starting Holoearth for the first time, you will be asked to create your own avatar. Choose from a range of eyes, hairstyles, build options, skin tones, and more to create an avatar to your liking.

You can change your avatar freely in Holoearth later, so feel free to think more about it later!

After creating an avatar and entering Holoearth, you can control your avatar using a mouse and keyboard.

The above controls can also be confirmed in-app via the HoloPhone menu (H key) by selecting “Help.”

■ Character movement Move your avatar with WASD.

Change camera angle with the mouse.

■ Camera manipulation Zoom with the mouse wheel.

Right click & drag to rotate your avatar.

■ Opening menus Esc brings up the global settings menu.

H opens the HoloPhone menu.

Tab opens inventory.

4: Purchase the ID Holder Item

It is necessary to purchase the in-app “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION ID Holder” in order to participate in NePoLaBo Live.

1. Choose Shop from the HoloPhone menu.

2. Purchase the event ID Holoder item.

Note: This item is also included in the NePoLaBo Cheer Set bundles.

After purchasing, you will be able to enter the concert venue in Holoearth. Note:

5: How to Move to the Live Venue on Dec 21

1. Press H to bring up the HoloPhone menu and select “Change Area.”

2. From the Area List, select the “Holoearth Live” area and click “Go.”

Those who purchased the ID Holder will be able to also participate in the 3D archive after the first showing.

Explore the event from different angles, take photos, and relive your favorite scenes. The 3D archive is shown at certain times of day during the archive viewing period according to the following daily schedule:

Daily showtimes (JST) between Dec 21, 21:00 (JST) – Jan 4, 23:59 (JST) (1) 08:00~ (2) 12:00~ (3) 19:00~ (4) 21:00~ (5) 23:00~

Note: The 3D archive may be played via the event venue screens for activities such as talent watch parties.

6: More Tips for a Better Experience

By hitting the minus (“-“) key, you can hide the entire UI hud display to get an unobstructed view of the concert!

And that wraps it up for getting started with Holoearth and participating in NePoLaBo Live. Next time, I will share tips on how to get the most out of the Holoearth concert experience, so please look forward to it!

items.author: Horii
items.content:
December 16, 2025, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration between hololive English -Justice- and world-famous fresh and natural cream puff chain Beard Papa’s. Beginning January 3rd, 2026 for a limited time, U.S. Beard Papa’s locations will debut four talent-inspired cream puffs, each themed after a member of the hololive English -Justice-.

“We’re thrilled to collaborate with hololive English -Justice- on bringing the talents to life through our handcrafted cream puffs,” said Mark Nathan, Marketing Director of Beard Papa’s. “Fans love the creativity and personality of hololive’s talents, and this collaboration allowed us to create completely new flavors guided by each member’s input, while maintaining Beard Papa’s signature quality.”

For more information, please visit Beard Papa’s official website and social media platforms.

Limited-Edition Cream Puffs made together with hololive English -Justice-

During the collaboration, fans can try Beard Papa’s iconic freshly baked puffs paired with flavor profiles crafted to reflect the personalities, color palettes, and motifs of each talent. These limited-edition flavors will be available for purchase at participating Beard Papa’s stores nationwide.

Every flavor was developed with input from the talents themselves, resulting in cream puffs that authentically capture each member’s unique style and character. The flavors and puffs are as follows:

A striking pink-raspberry chocolate shell with Oreo crumble and blue nonpareils, reflecting Elizabeth’s bold flair and engaging presence.

A bright, refreshing matcha-white chocolate dip topped with soft mini marshmallows, capturing Cecilia’s calm, green aesthetic and happy energy.

Rich dark Belgian chocolate custard paired with handmade orange crumble and finishing chocolate, inspired by Gigi’s bright colors and fun energy.

A strawberry-vanilla crumble coating crowned with a disc-chocolate “hat,” reflecting Raora’s charisma and playful charm.

Collector Combo Sets for a Unique Fan Experience

To complement the four limited-edition hololive English -Justice- talent’s cream puffs, fans can also purchase exclusive collaboration sets available in three formats. The 4-Piece Set includes one of each talent flavor paired with a 4-sticker collectible pack featuring the hololive English -Justice- members.

For guests looking to enjoy more, the 6-Piece Set includes all four talent puffs plus two Original Beard Papa’s cream puffs and comes with an exclusive acrylic keychain available only through this set.

For the ultimate collector, the 12-Piece Set features two full 6-packs and is bundled with a limited-edition collaboration tote bag, making it the premium option for fans and families alike.

The Beard Papa’s x hololive English -Justice- Collaboration Puffs will be available for a limited time at all participating Beard Papa’s locations across the U.S. Online orders will be available through the Beard Papa’s official app, website, and delivery partners in select markets.

Originally founded in Osaka, Japan in 1999, Beard Papa’s has grown into a global dessert phenomenon known for its crisp shell, fluffy choux pastry, and all-natural cream fillings made fresh daily. With locations across the U.S. and over 550 stores worldwide, Beard Papa’s continues to delight fans with seasonal flavors, creative collaborations, and its signature tagline — “World’s Best Cream Puff.”

Rapid and intense camera movements—such as panning quickly from side to side, tilting up and down, or repeatedly zooming in and out—may cause fast motion across the screen and strong flickering.
